content.raw:
With the recent addition of `make tests`, I discovered that the tests don't all compile on windows:

~~~
gazebo\math\Helpers_TEST.cc(51) : error C2124: divide or mod by zero
jom: D:\Jenkins\workspace\gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64\workspace\gazebo\build\gazebo\math\CMakeFiles\UNIT_Helpers_TEST.dir\build.make [gazebo\math\CMakeFiles\UNIT_Helpers_TEST.dir\Helpers_TEST.cc.obj] Error 2
~~~

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/1029/
* http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_windows/job/gazebo-ci-default-windows7-amd64/431/
